pullrequest.title: undo redo added to edit menu and re arranged it

content.raw:
Well just form a user point, when i feel like that i want to edit a model 'or edit anything' , the first thing i look at is the edit menu.

We can leave it as Edit ->"Model" and write beside it "Open Model editor" or "Enter Model editor" with a font like the one the shortcuts are written in, that way we don't have to put it in the window menu even if its entirely different windows.
content.html:
Well just form a user point, when i feel like that i want to edit a model 'or edit anything' , the first thing i look at is the edit menu.

We can leave it as Edit ->"Model" and write beside it "Open Model editor" or "Enter Model editor" with a font like the one the shortcuts are written in, that way we don't have to put it in the window menu even if its entirely different windows.
